title: Something has to give in Ranked
body:
Because this, http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/103836026/200513795/eog is just NOT good enough for ranked.

A Teemo who just hit level 30 1.5 weeks ago.

A Talon who plays mostly custom games.

And I don't even want to think what drugs the other 2 were on, they have played plenty of games, they should not have lost that bad considering top and mid did not roam.

As the jungler, how the hell can you baby sit 3 lanes? It seems like Riot does not care for ranked, they will just let anybody play.

replies.body: HAHA told to to BEWARE of JasonWazza

You mad because i managed to point out that he fucked up within the first 4 minutes?

Hell within champion select.

That guy seems like an ass hole with a 12 inch pole up his ass. I can go into anyones game and grab random stats to prove my point, not hard to do that. A bit harder to give some real advice if you are not in the actual game.

well yes wen you hit lv 30 you can play ranked would you like it if they made it 60 or 100 maybe all the champs in the game look if you get to plat up you don't get afk or dc or trolls and before you say ow no its too hard with trolls lots of you tubers do it in 3 days and I did it in a month I don't play like I ones did so im now ranked nothing but its not imposable

you realise plat 5 is the top 10% right.

Its harder to climb elo than you think, like fuck i just carried a plat 5 adc on my level 18 smurf.

As you can see from this account i am still bronze.

So lets put that in perspective, someone who is top 90% carried someone who is top 10%

The entire point of a ranking system goes out the window if there are people far far FAR below their league that cant get out of it due to some arbitrary number system designed for 2 player competitive matches like chess.

Not team based competitions.

Are you aware that normals are the place where people in high elo don't actually try?

Do you want a medal?

> [{quoted}](name=Mr TeaTime,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zKZ9WU3b,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-09-12T18:29:30.217+0000)
>
> you realise plat 5 is the top 10% right.
> 
> Its harder to climb elo than you think, like fuck i just carried a plat 5 adc on my level 18 smurf.
> 
> As you can see from this account i am still bronze.
> 
> So lets put that in perspective, someone who is top 90% carried someone who is top 10%
> 
> The entire point of a ranking system goes out the window if there are people far far FAR below their league that cant get out of it due to some arbitrary number system designed for 2 player competitive matches like chess.

THIS

Try to clime out of bronze or what ever you are in  in one month don't flame in games don't bitch at a troll try to get them to work with you most of the time you can say il give you a skin if you help and they will im not saying you do flame but you probs do wen your mad and above all don't play ranked if you are on a losing streak as you will loss and loss and loss its called tilted 

one month that's all im gona say

At least someone gets it. But no matter how you try and make the system, having a 5v5 games means you HAVE to really on some of your team to win.

Last game we had Yas mid, fed to Lux AND Vayne and than proceeded to blame us for the lose, he went 0/5 before I died my first death at 14 minutes. It even got to the point he blamed our jungler when he got ganked and died, even at that point when our jungler was dead it was still his fault.

There is ALWAYS going to be a fault in the system when you rely on someone else to help you, until Riot can come up with something else, all we can do is complain and show how unhappy we are.

I still think using the personal scoring system is a good idea to change elo, because than when my team starts feeding I will have an incentive not to just rush the enemy and start feeding myself, I will actually try and play well no matter how bad my team is to try and keep my score up.
be careful, all the oce boards residents like jasonwazza will tell you that you lost that because you're bad and not deserving of anything higher.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zKZ9WU3b,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-09-13T06:28:00.509+0000)
>
> Sorry let me get into character and join your circle jerk
> 
> *ahem*
> 
> WAAA GOLD PLAYERS ARE SUCH PLEBS RANKED NEEDS TO HAVE RESTRICTIONS CAUSE I'M A FUCKING 12 YEAR OLD THAT POST'S ON BOARDS FOR A FUCKING CRY.

when did i ever say anything about restrictions? you're confusing different people mate. good luck next time though.

Let's see him say something about this.

20/09/2015 @ 20:16 - I went Yi Jungle, score of 3/5. My team had 2/7, 1/9, 0/8 and 0/5. 10 minutes in all 3 lanes had lost their first tower.

As much as I do acknowledge when I have a bad game or get counter picked, sometimes there is NOTHING that can be done, you simply have to rely on your team, after all, it is a team game.

Cause you know, playing Yi jungle is a useful thing to do in ranked when your trash and can't 1v5.

EDIT: hell i can go into the item build tab for you and tell you don't even know how to jungle, your first back was at 7 minutes.

And were you in that game? No, you have no idea what actually happened and therefore have no idea why I went B at the 7 minute mark.

You try play jungle and go B at 4 minutes when 3 of your lanes are losing and tell me how much more useful that would have been.

And might I ask, who are you anyway? You run around acting like you know everything about everything in this game even though you are not in those games and have no replays to watch to say what actually went wrong. You are just assuming you know better than everyone and pick out random stats that justify what you are saying, anyone can do that.

You play master yi, a champ who basically says "i'm going to ignore everyone until i can 1v5 and then carry" and then proceed to tell me that you didn't go B because of other people?

I do just go B in those cases, because there is no point just wandering around doing shit all, especially as master yi.

Also as for who i am, i know how this game works better then you, and it's not just random stats i use, because i use accurate stats, fact is unless you are ganking, which if you were, your playing the wrong champion, there is no reason you should have a back at 7 minutes over a back at ~3-4 minutes.

Even champs that manage a gank in those time zones still manage a back at ~5 minutes.

So instead of trying to help my team, what you are telling me is I should be at X minutes and just let them die? Cause that's what it sounds like.

The whole point of a jungler is what?

You have your own 'lane' to get some XP and gold and while you are in the vicinity of the other lanes, if the opportunity presents itself, go help them.

If I am at the golems and the enemy team is pushing under our tower, I am not going to go "Oh no, it's been 4 minutes, I need to B" when I can go gank and possibly get some kills.

THEN PICK A DIFFERENT JUNGLER.

You are master fucking yi, not just your normal CC heavy early ganking jungler.

If I had a replay of that game I would show it to you so you can see how much of a dick head you sound like right now.

It's not always easy to follow a jungle path down to a T in every single game. Shit happens and you need to help your team, as Yi or not, it's called teamwork.

Maybe at high ranks your team are not retarded enough to lose their lanes, all 3 of them, 10 minutes in and you can free farm your jungle for late game.

Sometimes shit happens and you need to help your team at the 3 minute mark and that makes your jungle slower.

I love these players who think it is all easy in the Bronze/Silver ranking.

If you had a replay i would tell you the same thing, it doesn't matter that "you can help" Master Yi doesn't give a shit, his job is to 1v5 after 20 minutes, not help at 4 minutes.

Stop playing master Yi and play a tank that actually ganks early (Sejuani, Amumu, Gragas, Jarvan, Vi)

Please do tell me how it is possible to 1v5 with Yi after 20 minutes in that game.

At 11:59 we had lost our THIRD tower. By than the score was 14 kills to 2. Teemo was dead 4 times and Talon 3, they decided to swap lanes and than died twice more each in 4 minutes.

By 16 minutes at was 22 to to 6 and I had 3 of those 6 kills. We were also down some 13K gold. Lost 5 towers and a dragon and that was it, game over.

How the fuck can I farm for 20 minutes when, even WITH helping my team, it was game over well and truly by 16 minutes? You really are a moron.

In a normal game where you team doesn't fold faster than a card house, yes a Yi can get some farm and actually do something late game, not in that game.
